column5: pikeslayerjr came over this evening for a visit. What a wonderful young man! We talked fishing, played around with my HDS5 trying to figure out how to do some fine tuning that I wanted to do, went over some maps and arial views, and had a nice fish fry.  This is one of those young men that anyone would be proud to introduce as their son! You done a good job pikeslayer!  One of the nicest evenings I can remember in a very long time! We are already looking forward to seeing him again soon!
Cliff the apple doesn't fall far from the tree, and being with you he can only get better.
Aww, that sounds like a great friendship is forming.  Great to hear Cliff, hope you two get to do tons of fishing and having fun together!!  Joey
Don't go bustin' your britches Pikeslayer and JR....Cliff said the same thing about me!  Seriously guys...glad it went so well.
LOL Roy, we still remember your visit (we've tried to forget but....)
Aw shucks Cliff. Marianne & I are both proud of Sean and very grateful to you and Sue. Thank you See you next week  Simon  Ps. Dinner's on us
